OOC: Well still at the beginnig of the episode
"Transmutate" that same kind of blast nearly fried
Silverbolt. I'm pretty sure it's unstable although I
agree it would put a drain on him (if he lasted much
longer I was going to put that as an additional factor
in the battle).

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Energon is energy, if anything it would Strengthen
> the surrounding 
> charachters and heavily drain Mutates energy. It
> wouldnt cause anything to 
> break, so the sword/staff thing shall not.
> Especially since you dont seem to 
> realize that the thing could be made of energy
> itself, a kind of metal, a 
> hybrid of the two, or whatnot. You just want to have
> what you want to happen, 
> happen.
>
